CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. The function uses the '$F(u).escapeHTML()' method to escape HTML entities, which can be bypassed by an attacker to inject malicious scripts. The injected scripts can be executed in the user's browser, leading to various attacks such as stealing sensitive information, session hijacking, and defacement of the website.
